You can upgrade your forest by adding or removing tree types:

1. Buy TREEs you want to add or remove (if you don’t have spare ones)

2. Send FOREST you want to change and TREEs you want to add or remove back to creator’s address. Burning works too, but don’t forget to contact @badfoxlab to get your upgraded FOREST

3. If you end up making a new combo you will receive FOREST ~ORIGINAL~. If ORIGINAL or GENESIS combos already exists you will receive an edition of FOREST ~UPGRADED~

4. Please don’t send/burn two and more FORESTs at the same time, I haven’t figure out the best mechanics for that
